sentences.en: A patient going through acute detox will have an assigned nurse nearby.
sentences.cn: 接受急性脱瘾治疗的病人身边会有一名指派的护士看护。

sentences.en: Angles of less than 90 degrees are called acute angles.
sentences.cn: 小于90度的角叫锐角.

sentences.en: He collapsed from acute renal failure.
sentences.cn: 他的身体因为严重的肾衰竭而垮掉了。

sentences.en: He is recovering in hospital after an operation for acute appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 做完急性阑尾炎手术后，他正在医院康复。

sentences.en: I was laid up in bed with acute rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 我染上了急性风湿，卧病在床。

sentences.en: I was suffering from acute sunstroke, starvation and exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 我严重中暑，又饿又累。

sentences.en: In the dark my sense of hearing becomes so acute.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中我的听觉变得异常灵敏。

sentences.en: Into her nineties, her thinking remained acute and her character forceful.
sentences.cn: 虽已年届九旬，她依然头脑敏锐，个性很强。

sentences.en: Patients were dying because of an acute shortage of nurses.
sentences.cn: 因为护理人员严重不足，患者生命垂危。

sentences.en: Simon’s vague manner concealed an acute mind.
sentences.cn: 西蒙貌似蒙昧，其实头脑灵活。

sentences.en: Statistically, ninety-eight percent of all acute sunstroke cases are fatal.
sentences.cn: 据统计，急性中暑病例中有98%是致命的。

sentences.en: The housing shortage is more acute than first thought.
sentences.cn: 住房短缺情况比一开始想的要严重。

sentences.en: The publication comes as the answer to an acute demand.
sentences.cn: 这一出版物是为满足急需而出版的.

sentences.en: The war has aggravated an acute economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 战争加剧了原本已很严重的经济危机。

sentences.en: There is an acute shortage of water.
sentences.cn: 水严重短缺。

sentences.en: They think his mother's illness is acute rather than chronic.
sentences.cn: 他们认为他母亲的病是急性的,不是慢性的.

sentences.en: War is the most acute form of expression of violence.
sentences.cn: 战争是暴力所表现的最剧烈的形式.

sentences.en: Young children have a particularly acute sense of smell.
sentences.cn: 幼儿的嗅觉特别灵敏。
